titleStmt.title: The birth, purpose, and mortall vvound of the Romish holie League Describing in a mappe the enuie of Sathans shauelings, and the follie of their wisedome, through the Almighties prouidence. By I.L.
titleStmt.author: I. L., fl. 1589.
Lea, James, fl. 1589, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: The "mortal wound" was the defeat of the Spanish Armada.--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
